backend/AltSignup.mo: Simple signup handler that validates non-empty username and password and returns a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing a reward system with time‑filtered reward history, inventory calculation, and access-controlled add/view operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI styling and icon-removal changes for Landing.tsx with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, sets II_URL env var, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Configuration specifying allowed alternative origins for Internet Identity derivation.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining root layout and multiple routes, including redirecting /login to /signup.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Shared Internet Identity config helpers providing AuthClient creation and login options using environment-derived settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug-only panel showing detailed auth state, timing, platform info, and stall detection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Displays an error message with optional Retry and Return-to-Landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Blocks app rendering until auth initializes or times out, handling stale sessions and retry flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Explains blocked popup issues for Internet Identity and provides retry and direct II link options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Shows real-time auth progress, timing, outcomes, and suggested actions with retry and II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup status with warming, ready, and failure states plus retry.
frontend/src/components/auth/DisplayName: Modal dialog letting users enter or skip setting a display name with validation and save/skip actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityCon: Card showing a principal’s display name and truncated ID with actions to continue or switch identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Effect handler that processes II authorize callbacks, validates session state, checks onboarding, and routes accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Wrapper that loads II config asynchronously before rendering the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostAuthDis: Gate that prompts new authenticated users to set or skip a display name before navigating to onboarding.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedHea: Header component for authenticated pages with logout, account deletion, and menu interactions.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout wrapping onboarding, auth initialization, and callback handlers around routed pages.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal for running a task timer with start/pause/resume logic, completion handling, and time selection.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config returning disabled settings with a warning to use the proxy client.
frontend/src/config/authInitializationGa: Config object defining timeout and messages for the auth initialization gate.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context that stores, hydrates, and persists onboarding results in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Hook managing user-initiated auth attempts with timestamps, correlation IDs, and sessionStorage tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks authentication steps with timing, logs transitions, detects slow steps, and records final outcomes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPageAutoredire: Auto-redirects authenticated users from login/signup pages based on identity, actor readiness, and profile/onboarding state.
Stabilizes auth state by waiting for Internet Identity initialization and identity restoration before declaring authenticated or not.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Warms up a canister by calling ping with timeout handling, tracking warmup state, auto-start, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalDisplayName.t: Manages per‑principal display names and skip flags in localStorage with get, set, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Implements mobile‑safe Internet Identity login with pre‑initialized AuthClient and structured outcome reporting.
Provides a mobile-safe Internet Identity login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and handles popup, cancellation, and identity retrieval errors.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Implements a context/provider for password-based identities with storage restoration, persistence, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Manages timeouts for post-authentication phases, tracking elapsed time and triggering callbacks when limits are reached.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor queries and mutations for user profiles and rewards with React Query, including cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewards.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and adding caller rewards with automatic cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps by tracking elapsed time, step-specific timeouts, and status transitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based chocolate-themed design tokens for colors, typography, and layout.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy placeholder that disables old AI client usage in favor of aiProxyClient.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Defines types, error handling, and validation helpers for calling AI proxy endpoints and parsing onboarding, weekly mountain, and daily steps responses.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage key and safe JSON parse/stringify helpers for persisting onboarding results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Fetches and displays daily tasks using AI-generated steps, handling auth, profile data, errors, and task completion rewards.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Shows the user’s earned chocolate rewards with time‑range filters and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with feature carousel and Internet Identity login flow including warmup, auth stabilization, and post-login routing.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Manages the multi‑step onboarding flow, generating AI plans, saving profiles, and routing based on auth and prior completion.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Complex Internet Identity signup flow with diagnostics, stalled-auth detection, mobile login handling, and multi-phase state management.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simplified backup signup page that triggers II login and redirects to onboarding when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays a post-onboarding carousel summarizing the user’s AI-generated goals and redirects to Weekly Mountain when finished.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Generates or loads the user’s weekly mountain goal using onboarding data or backend profile and caches results per week.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides logging utilities for correlating and timing authentication steps, transitions, and outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/dailyInputs.ts: Derives daily AI generation inputs from onboarding data or backend goal plus cached weekly mountain.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities and detects stale sessions based on delegation and anonymity checks.
frontend/src/utils/iiReturnDetection.ts: Detects signs of returning from an Internet Identity authentication flow via URL hash or session flags.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from username/password and stores, restores, or clears them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and exposes cached platform info for conditional UI behavior.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts unknown AI-provided values to strings and provides validation and fallback helpers for rendering.
frontend/src/utils/sessionFlags.ts: Manages a session-scoped flag indicating new-account signup flow using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/sessionReset.ts: Clears all SweetSteps-related persisted localStorage state on logout or account deletion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routes and session storage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, and state versioning.
